name: TowerDefenseWithAI
description:
TowerDefenseWithAI 🗼

A tower defense game that introduces pathfinding with breadth-first search.

Game Rules:

  • Click on the grass to place a tower.
  • Kill all barrets in addition to get more Gold and buy more towers 🏹
  • If your Gold reaches 0 you lose (almost the same as life) 💰

Notes:

Press "C" to see how the algorithm works.

code:
